patthana8.45:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
patthana8.45:0.3_0: this is his partner and respected.
patthana8.45:1.1_0: There is no ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
patthana8.45:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the mind.
patthana8.45:3.1_0: There are nine based on what is the reason for convincing. ...”
